title: 新版的BungeeCord如何设置登录服，就是填写登录服的端口
author: 不死之躯
txt_content:
新版的，我找不到如何设置登录服的端口

【急】【急】【急】【急】【急】【急】【急】【急】


新版的没有default_server了

replies.author: patqian
replies.txt_content:
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&c登入服'
    address: 127.0.0.1:20001
    restricted: false
  lobby1:
    motd: '&c生存服'
    address: 127.0.0.1:20000
    restricted: false

replies.author: MCGO1
replies.txt_content:
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&c登入服'
    address: 127.0.0.1:20001
求最挂
